last_episode_to_air.name: Sofia
last_episode_to_air.overview: Empowered by a new lead, the agency dives headfirst into Sofia’s case, bringing Raul one step closer to finding his daughter.

name: The Missing
overview: Every two minutes, someone disappears in Brazil. Os Ausentes, an agency run by a former cop with a search of his own, takes the cases no one will to help other people reunite with their loved ones.

episodes.name: Roberta and Marcella
episodes.overview: As Raul fights to keep his detective agency afloat while searching for a missing mother and daughter, the mysterious Maria Júlia joins his cause.

episodes.name: Ailton
episodes.overview: Things get personal when Waldir tackles a friend’s case. Meanwhile, Maria Júlia fights to prove herself for a permanent spot with the agency.

episodes.name: Alzira
episodes.overview: As they dig deeper into their respective pasts, Raul and Maria Júlia investigate a string of disappearances at a retirement home.

episodes.name: Josley
episodes.overview: In the aftermath of a dangerous accident, the Ausentes team attempts to track down a missing truck driver, while Raul and Maria Júlia track down leads of their own.

episodes.name: Kelvin
episodes.overview: While his agents search for a missing prisoner, Raul’s downward spiral leads him towards a shocking personal revelation that could help him crack the case.

episodes.name: Zayn
episodes.overview: The search for a missing Syrian man finds Raul and the team immersed in São Paulo’s refugee community. Meanwhile, an incident with Maria Júlia puts Raul’s trust in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Tetsuo
episodes.overview: While investigating the disappearance of a young boy, the team uncovers his family’s ties to an illegal smuggling ring. As a distraught Raul awaits answers in his daughter’s case, Maria Júlia grapples with her own trauma.

episodes.name: Ciro
episodes.overview: The agency investigates the case of a missing public official who may have ties to local organ traffickers. Then, as Raul uncovers clues related to his daughter’s disappearance, Maria Júlia’s search takes an unexpected turn.

episodes.name: Sofia
episodes.overview: Empowered by a new lead, the agency dives headfirst into Sofia’s case, bringing Raul one step closer to finding his daughter.
